Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory551.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory860.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: 'You get to the meeting with Qu right on time.'}
{3: 'A breeze ruffles her hair as you see a familiar figure with her back to you on the mountaintop. She turns, giving a small nod.'}
{2: 'Bringing someone up a mountain this late, you must have something big on your mind.', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Absolutely. You can see all of Kowloong from here. Now, come stand next to me.', 4: '1'}
{3: "It's rare to see her so mysterious, not giving any hints about this invitation."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Hold on, what's in your hand?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's a greeting gift, for you.", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Oh? You know Kowloong customs. What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'That little mechanical figure from the treasure room.', 3: '16'}
{3: 'When you open your hand, there is a delicate mechanical peacock in your palm.'}
{3: 'Qu looks at the gift, pausing a bit when she sees the mechanical peacock.'}
{2: 'Even though you said it was worthless and broken.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'But I thought if I fixed it up... you might be a bit happier.', 3: '20'}
{3: 'She takes the gift and looks it over.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Who\'d have thought it\'d be such a... "priceless" gift.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This mechanical doll, found with Qu in Kowloong\'s treasure room, has no value beyond "someone\'s hope and happiness", but she treasures it.'}
{3: 'Having shared in the hopes and joys of everyday folks, she finally understands how she truly feels about that little mechanical figure.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You really are the only one who gets me. It's amazing how in sync we are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you think of it?', 3: '30', 4: 'You got me a gift too?', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I've got a gift for you too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You can actually go to my treasure room anytime and take anything you like. Gold, silver, jewels, antiques—all those "valuable" things are yours.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Feel free to check my treasure room anytime you want. Gold, silver, jewels, antiques—whatever "valuable" thing you fancy, it\'s yours.', 4: '1'}
{3: ".And it's clear, she hasn't brought anything you can put a price on."}
{3: 'She pulls you close with her free hand, lining you up shoulder to shoulder.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But what I want to give you is way better than that.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu signals, and Huiyu immediately circles them, letting out a sharp cry to the sky.'}
{3: 'Midnight comes, and Kowloong City looks blurry, so I rub my eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory860.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '2'}
{3: "Looking closer, you see they aren't just lights, but individual lanterns floating up from the streets of Kowloong."}
{3: 'From tiny specks to shining like the Milky Way, it changes in a heartbeat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "They've been getting ready for a while, waiting for me to signal.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'All over Kowloong, people are sending up lanterns with their wishes, hoping someone special will see them.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory860.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory860.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Everyone's combined will changed me, and now their prayers will keep you safe, happy, win every fight, and never get lost.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Since Kowloong was rebuilt, there hasn't been such a big voluntary event—all these connections are because of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm here on this mountaintop today because of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "There's always this part of the world that comes together and shines because of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'How is this not a remarkable "miracle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Happy Birthday.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The people of Kowloong celebrate this small miracle, while Qu's silhouette is lit by the rising river of light, seen only by her only companion."}
{3: 'They hold hands, watching the lanterns until they disappear into the night.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's not just about the lanterns... I've got a lot more to say.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're already being pretty honest.", 3: '69', 4: "I'm listening.", 5: '70'}
{3: 'Qu smiles a little, not denying it.'}
{3: 'Qu smiles a little.'}
{3: 'She looks at the little figure, her mind going back to when she barely knew this person, and then she says that same thing she always does.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Mechanoids, Constructs... they can always be fixed. But you're different.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I've always seen something in you that goes way beyond being human.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Even with your fragile human body, you're always at the front when there's trouble, steady like a beacon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Sometimes, even I watch your back.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So fragile... yet stronger than anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's a pretty direct compliment, coming from me, you know.", 3: '79', 4: 'Thank you so much!', 5: '80'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "If you'd like, I can be more blunt. You earned this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You're welcome. You deserve every bit of it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She puts the gift away and gently pats the hand next to her.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "The moonlight's still nice, Commandant. Would you like to take another walk through Kowloong with me?", 4: '1'}
